Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enacts the disaster preparedness week and awareness campaign act of 2019
Summary: Enacts the "disaster preparedness week and awareness campaign act"; provides for an awareness campaign for disaster preparedness during the third full week in September.
LawCode: Add ยง29-l, amd ยง21, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the "disaster preparedness week and awareness campaign act of 2019"
